text: anak teangnoh haey del a l laoh ban bratan nie k meat dl puokke aoy kaet chea na pi knongchamnaom kaunchaw adam ning ampi banda anak del yeung ban sangkroh cheamuoynung nuoh ning kaunchaw ai pr hi m ning aisreael haeyning ampi banda anak del yeung ban changaoul bangheanh ning ban chreusareusa . nowpel del mean ke sautr ayeat robsa mcheasa mha sabborsa aoy puokke sdab puokke ban krab saou chout ning yom( daoysaar kaotakhlach a l laoh)
